data.text: @ChasingKarma44 @SenBlumenthal They are trying to rid the STREETS & COMMUNITY OF CRIMINALS!!!!! The Rhetoric is getting people killed for what? Democrats? To take the spotlight off of the stolen 9 BILLION THEY STOLE? It’s disgusting. This crap is not happening in other cities who help ICE.
@SenBlumenthal What about “the face of the American Citizens”  that where killed by illegal invaders that you let into our country by the millions?

@SenBlumenthal The only chaos and lawlessness we see is from your domestic terrorist party’s useful idiots, clown.
All you retards know is projection.🥱

@SenBlumenthal You guys let the illegals in with the border open for four years while you told us it was secure, now that we try to solve the problem. You stand in the way, and you ramp the people up to stand in the way, you’re a fucking disgrace Richard.
@SenBlumenthal Stolen Valor  — he is a criminal !! Lying about being in combat !! You are pathetic !

@SenBlumenthal If you’re illegally in the country or obstructing law enforcement, YOU are being hunted down. 
YOUR behavior will put YOUR family and the kids in that position. 

You fucking libtards are TO BLAME. 
YOU let in 20+ million ILLEGALS. 

Fuck you, your lies and blame shifting. https://t.co/IV4rqk1BpD
@tommoetnt70316 @SenBlumenthal Yes, they do deserve to be remembered. But let’s not punish innocent people for those crimes because they happen to be immigrants, with or without papers.
